subdisciplines.name: Cognitive Anthropology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the relationship between human cognition and culture.

subdisciplines.name: Economic Anthropology
subdisciplines.description: The study of how economics and culture interact.

subdisciplines.name: Political Anthropology
subdisciplines.description: The study of political systems and their relationship with culture.

subdisciplines.name: Ecological Anthropology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the relationship between humans and their environment.

subdisciplines.name: Historical Anthropology
subdisciplines.description: The study of past cultures through their material remains.

subdisciplines.name: Medical Anthropology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the relationship between culture, health, and illness.

subdisciplines.name: Linguistic Anthropology
subdisciplines.description: The study of language and its relationship to culture.
